10040 - Resource item not found

Whenever we try to read / update resource from a collection of resources this exception might occur if the given item does not exist. Below you can find a sample error response:

{"error_code": 10040,
 "error_description": "Resource /sample-resource version 1.0 item 123 does not exist.",
 "error_details": <link to this page>}
